title: The Kids Are All White: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode (RE-RELEASE)
itunes:title: The Kids Are All White: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode (RE-RELEASE)
description:
Hey MMTM Listeners! Langston and David will be back making motherf*ckin' mini episodes soon. In the meantime rate and review the podcast or send your conspiracy theories/thoughts over to mymommapod@gmail.com

--

Langston and David answer a listener's email about if you have kids with a white person and deny your Blackness, then the white genes win.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
